name: Invaders (itch) (xNYARLx)
description:
The Earth have been attacked by invaders! You only have one ship, one life and poor shield to repel the relentless attack. 

The game is free, fully completed. Help develop the project to make it even better! Take advantage of the donation option :)

-Three kinds of enemies, but believe me, this will be enough to give you a hard time!

-Bosses

-Highscore

-Free updates in future

CONTROLLS:

Mouse left button - SHOOT

Mouse right button - ACCELERATE

P - Pauses and un-pauses the game in gameplay mode

Q - Quit to menu from gameplay mode and from pause "menu"

ESC - Quit from the game from everywhere

M - Pauses and un-pauses the game music (not work only in pause "menu")

REQUIREMENTS:

LOW
